sentences: Tudd Thomas Sanga (born 24 September 1981), popularly known by his career name Tudd Thomas, is a Tanzanian music producer, sound engineer, singer and songwriter.
He has been a producer for Tanzania House of Talents (THT) for more than four years.
Tudd Thomas has been nominated in 2015 Tanzania Music Awards as best music producer of the year in Tanzania, and rAll Africa Music Awads AFRIMA 2015 as a best producer in Africa.
